PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2002-04722002-03-220,  ,  AGRI-FOOD,  TB,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisAuthority to enter into a SUPPLEMENTARY AGREEMENT to amend the CANADA- BRITISH COLUMBIA COMPANION AGREEMENT in order to allow the province to pay its share of matching contributions under the NISA Agreement for Stabilization Year 2000 and under the Crop Insurance Agreement for 2001, from its share of federal agricultural risk management funding.
